description: JSON Schema generated by XMLSpy v2023 (x64) (http://www.altova.com)

MPL_CharacteristicCodeType.description:
Code list: CL771 
----------------------------------------- 
1 = KLW item a 
2 = KLW item b 
3 = KalfOK item a 
4 = KalfOK item b 
5 = KalfOK item c 
etc., etc.

MPL_CharacteristicDomainCodeType.description:
Code list CL770 :
101 = KalfOK score (GD) 
102 = PBB (Periodiek BedrijfsBezoek, GD) 
103 = CDM (Continue DiergezondheidsMonitor, GD) 
104 = KKM (keuring apparatuur, GD) 
105 = Kalversterfte (GD) 
106 = KK (KoeKompas) 
107 = Klimaatscore (KLW) 
108 = Biodiversiteit score (KLW) 
109 = Weidegang indicator (Zuivel) 
110 = Fosfaatrecht 
111 = Natuur & landschap 
112 = DDD (Dierdagdosering, MediRund)

aggregationLevelCodeType.description:
listID = CL780:

11 = actual measurement, one moment in time 
12 = average over start-end period 
13 = accumulated over start-end period 
14 = average since first delivery

calculatedIndicatorCodeType.description:
Indicates wether the result is calculated or measured.
0 = measured 
1 = calculated

currencyCodeType.description:
EUR = Euro 
USD = US Dollar 
GBP = Pound Sterling

dairyCompany.description: The dairy company that processes the milk.

dairyCompanyIdentifier.description:
Within the scope of this data exchange, unique identifier of this dairy company.
In the Netherlands: Fabrieksnummer.

items.description: The option to add an extra, secondary, identifier of this dairy company, e.g. a GLN.

data.description: The root of the hierarchical structured data set.

invoice.description: The payment by the dairy company to the farmer, concerning one or more milk deliveries.

invoiceDateTime.description:
The date the invoice is/was issued.
Dutch reference: ADED 201134.

currencyCode.description:
Global standard code referring to the currency that is used in this invoice.
Dutch reference: ADED 402617.

invoicePeriodId.description:
To refer to a specific invoice within a specific period of time. For instance  the number of the month plus a sequence numer.
Dutch reference: Periodenummer, ADED: 204272.
For RFC: InvoicePeriodId is the sequence number of invoices within the same period; so for RFC '2023110' means the first invoice in period 202311, '2022111' means the second invoice in period 202211.

invoicePeriodStartDate.description: Start date of the time period this invoice refers to.

invoicePeriodEndDate.description: End date of the time period this invoice refers to.

totalPaymentVatExcluded.description: Total value of this invoice, value added tax excluded.

totalVat.description:
Total value added tax for this invoice.
To differentiate the VAT-amounts to different VAT-percentages, see the InvoiceLines.

totalMilkRelatedAmountVatExcluded.description: Is in The Netherlands called 'Zuiver Melkgeld'.

totalPaymentVatIncluded.description: Total value of this invoice, value added tax included.

items.description: In case there are no MilkDelivery lines linked to this Invoice, reference to one or more of the MilkDeliveries this invoice is based on.

invoiceLine.description: A single line of the invoice, referring to the cost or the payment of one specific type of product, service or item.

amountVatExcluded.description:
Total amount of money (VAT excluded) for this invoice line.
Dutch reference: ADED 204389.

amountVatIncluded.description: Total amount of money (VAT included) for this invoice line.

description.description:
Short description for this invoice line.
Dutch reference: ADED 204520.

discountPer100Ltr.description:
Discount per 100 litres of milk.
Dutch reference: ADED 204630.

itemCode.description:
Unique identifier of the item or topic the invoice line relates to.
Dutch explanation: Deze artikelcodes zijn uniek binnen een zuivelonderneming. Voor een landelijke unieke aanduiding van een artikel moet de artikelcode gebruikt worden in combinatie met "200088 nummer zuivelonderneming" (ook wel fabrieksnummer genoemd). ADED 204521.
itemCodeTypes Qlip (CL760): 
1 = melk 
11 = vetkilogrammen 
21 = eiwitkilogrammen 
31 = gemiddeld lactose 
33 = gemiddeld ureum 
41 = inhouding per kg melk 
etc, etc 
-------------------------------------------------- 
itemCodeTypes FC (CL761): 
1 = rauwe melk 
2 = rauwe melk (L) 
5 = vet garantieprijs 
6 = correctie vet garantieprijs 
10 = eiwit garantieprijs 
11 = correctie eiwit garantieprijs 
etc, etc, etc

kindOfPaymentCode.description:
Indicates whether it concerns a regular payment or some kind of special payment.
Dutch reference: ADED 204640 Afrekeningsvolgnummer:
0 = in geval van een normale melkafrekening
1 = in geval van een prestatietoeslag
2 = in het geval van dividenduitkering.

ledgerAccountNumber.description: Refers to a standard code for a specific cost or benefit (used in bookkeeping and financial reports). Dutch reference: GRAS-code: code list CL764.

milkDeliveryReferenceId.description:
In case there are no MilkDelivery lines linked to this Invoice, reference to one or more of the MilkDeliveries this invoice is based on.
In case of Qlip, the identifier (15 characters) is a concatenation of:
	- dairy factory identifier (3 characters) (in Dutch: fabrieksnummer)
	- delivery data (6 characters)
	- dairy collection identifier (unique within the scope of the dairy factory) (4 characters) (in Dutch: ritnummer)
	- intake identifier (unique within the domain of the dairy collection identifier)). (2 characters) (in Dutch: inname nummer)

In case of RFC the factory identifier is: 001.

paymentPeriodEndDate.description:
The end of the period of time this invoice line relates to.
Dutch reference: ADED 201747.

paymentPeriodStartDate.description:
The beginning op the period of time this invoice line relates to.
Dutch reference: ADED 201746.

pricePerUnitVatExcluded.description:
The price of one base unit of the item this invoice line relates to. VAT excluded. The size of a base unit is indicated by UnitBaseQuantity. E.g. if the base quantity for instance is 1 KG than BaseUnitQauntity is 1. If the base quantity is 100 KG than BaseUnitQuantity is 100.
Dutch reference: ADED 204387.

quantity.description:
The quantity of the item this invoice line relates to.
Dutch reference: ADED 202435 .

unitBaseQuantity.description: Indicates the number of of units for the given PricePerUnitVAT_Excluded. For instance, if UnitBaseQuantiy is 100 and UnitForProcePerUnit is KG. This means that if PricePerUnitVAT_Excluded is 65.30 that the price of 100 KG of the product is 65.30 EUR.

unitForPricePerUnitCode.description: The unit for expressing a single base unit quantity of the item this invoice line relates to. For dairy the most common units are LTR and KGM.

vatAmount.description:
Amount of value added tax, calculated for this specific invoice line.
Dutch reference: ADED 204388.

vatPercentage.description:
Percentage of the value added tax.
Dutch reference: ADED 204557.

invoiceReferencedCharacteristic.description:
Characteristic to be mentioned as the base for determining this specific invoice line.
In Dutch: De basis voor de uitbetaling.

invoiceRefererencedCharacteristicCode.description: Identifier of the characteristic that is referred to as being a fundamental for determining this payment line.

invoiceCharacteristicValue.description: The value of this specific characteristic.

invoiceCharacteristicDescription.description: Short description of this specific characteristic.

kindOfPaymentCodeType.description:
listID = CL779:

0 = normale melkafrekening 
1 = prestatietoeslag 
2 = dividenduitkering

legalEntity.description: The legal entity of the farm or a company (the holding).

legalEntityIdentifier.description: In the Netherlands the legal entity is identified with a chamber of commerce number (KvK) or a BRS.

items.description:
Option the add an extra, secondary, identifier of this legal entity.
In the Netherlands, besides the KvK-number a BRS might be added.

measurementType.description: Standard data type for expressing the value of a measurement. To be used for all types of measurement in this class model.

unitCode.description: The code that refers to the standard unit or dimension to express the value of theis measurement. E.g. KGM for kilogram.

value.description: Expresses the measured value of the measurement.

measurementUnitCodeType.description:
listID = CL020 
------------------------------ 
KGM = kilogram 
LTR = liter 
NBR = number (aantal) 
GL = gram per liter 
GRM100GRM = gram per 100 gram 
CEL = degree Celsius 
P1 = percent 
M1 = milligram per liter 
MGM100GRM = milligram per 100 gram 
NBRKGM = aantal per kilogram
NONE = no unit of measurement
KVEML = KVE per millilitre
MGMKG = milligram per kilogram
KCELMLT = 10^3 cells per ml
MM100GRM = millimole/100 gram 
PH = acidity
MCLTR = microgram per liter
MC100GRM = microgram per hectogram
DAY = day
MONTH = month
ANN = year

milkDelivery.description:
Milk delivery event, meaning the emptying of the milk tank of this milk production location. The milk is taken from the milk tank and delivered to the dairy company to be processed.
In the Netherlands: a visit of a RMO.

factorLitresToKilogram.description: Factor to  convert a quantity of milk expressed in litres into a quantity of milk expressed in kilograms.

items.description:
The within this event, delivered quantity of milk.
Can be expressed in litres and/or in kilograms.

milkDeliveryDateTime.description:
Timestamp for this milk delivery.
In the Netherlands: ADED 201731.

milkDeliveryDelInd.description: Indicator (true, false) that this record should be deleted (true) by the receiving party.

milkDeliveryId.description:
Within the domain of the dairy company, unique identifier for this milk delivery.
In case of Qlip, the identifier (15 characters) is a concatenation of:
	- dairy factory identifier (3 characters) (in Dutch: fabrieksnummer)
	- delivery data (6 characters)
	- dairy collection identifier (unique within the scope of the dairy factory) (4 characters) (in Dutch: ritnummer)
	- intake identifier (unique within the domain of the dairy collection identifier)). (2 characters) (in Dutch: inname nummer)
In case of RFC the factory identifier is: 001.

milkTemperature.description: The temperature of the delivered milk.

remark.description: A remark concerning this delivery of milk.

milkDeliveryForecast.description:
Forecasted quantity of the milk to be delivered over a specific period of time.
Send by the milk production location to the dairy company.

forecastedQuantityMilk.description: The forecasted quantity of milk to be delivered.

milkDeliveryForecastDateTime.description: The timestamp of the milk delivery forecast.

periodEndDate.description: The end date of the period in which the forecasted quantity of milk is to be produced.

periodStartDate.description: The start date of the period in which the forecasted quantity of milk is to be produced.

remark.description: Remark concerning this forecast of milk production.

milkProductionLocationIdentifier.description:
For the Netherlands, the primary key for a production location is the ftn (RFC) or ubn.
For Belgium it is the Productieëenheidnummer.

items.description: The option to add an extra, secondary, identifier for this production location.

milkProductionLocationCharacteristic.description: A set of general characteristics about this dairy farm.

mPL_CharacteristicDateTime.description: Time stamp of the moment this characteristic was determined.

mPL_CharacteristicDeletionIndicator.description:
True = this data element is deleted
False = this data element is not deleted.

mPL_CharacteristicDescription.description:
Short name of the domain of this characteristic.
In the Netherlands for instance: KringLoopWijzer.

mPL_CharacteristicDomainCode.description:
Specifies the domain of the characteristic.
For the Netherlands for instance: KLW (KringLoopWijzer), weidegang indicator, fosfaatrecht, carbon footprint, etc.

mPL_CharacteristicOriginReferenceId.description:
Reference to the origin of this production unit characteristic, in case this differs from the dairy company that processed the milk of this production location.
E.g. for The Netherlands: KLW, MediRund, GD, etc.

mPL_CharacteristicPeriodEndDate.description: End date-time of the period the characteristic applies to.

mPL_CharacteristicPeriodStartDate.description: Begin date-time of the period the characteristic applies to.

milkProductionLocationCharacteristicLine.description: Within the domain of the MilkProductionCharacteristic a value of one specific characteristic.

mPL_CharacteristicCode.description: Code that refers to a specific characteristic of this milk production location.

mPL_CharacteristicLineDeletionIndicator.description: Indicator (true, false) that this record should be deleted (true) by the receiving party.

mPL_CharacteristicValue.description: The value of a specific characteristic of this milk production location.

valueAggregationlevelCode.description: Indicates whether this is one measurement, a cumulated value or an average.

milkQualityLineRemarkCodeType.description:
listID = CL768. Gradatie melkkwaliteit 
------------------------------- 
001 = goed 
002 = matig 
003 = let op 
004 = slecht 
005 = mislukt 
etc., etc.

milkQualitySample.description: Determined quality of the milk. Resulting in one of more values (QualityLines), one for each quality characteristic (fat, protein, etc.) of the milk.

milkDeliveryReferenceId.description:
In case this quality report refers to one or more milk deliveries.
In case of Qlip, the identifier (15 characters) is a concatenation of:
	- dairy factory identifier (3 characters) (in Dutch: fabrieksnummer)
	- delivery data (6 characters)
	- dairy collection identifier (unique within the scope of the dairy factory) (4 characters) (in Dutch: ritnummer).
	- intake identifier (unique within the domain of the dairy collection identifier)). (2 characters) (in Dutch: inname nummer)

In case of RFC the factory identifier is: 001.

milkQualityDateTime.description: The timestamp of this determination of the quality of the milk.

milkQualityDelInd.description: Indicator (true, false) that this record should be deleted (true) by the receiving party.

milkQualityExtraPenaltyPoints.description: Extra penalty points, given for very poor quality milk.

milkQualityId.description:
Within the domain of the dairy company, unique identifier for this determination of the quality of the milk.
Dutch reference: ADED 200460.

milkQualityPenaltyPoints.description: Specific for this milk delivery, the total score on quality points, based on the determined overall quality of this milk delivery. This total quality score might affect the price for the milk that is paid to the farmer.

milkQualityStatusCode.description: Indicates if the results of this quality determination are used or not for determining the payment to the dairy farmer.

milkQualityStatusCodeType.description:
Afhankelijk van het kwaliteitssysteem dat de fabriek hanteert.
listID = CL776 
------------------------------------------------ 
1 = basis voor uitbetaling 
2 = extra analyse 
3 = maandmonster

milkTank.description: The milk tank on a production location.

milkTankIdentifier.description:
Unique identifier of the milk tank of this production location.
One production location might have one or more milk tanks.

unitOfMeasure.description: The unit of measurement for the temperature of the milk: default = CEL (degree Celsius).

value.description: The temperature of the delivered milk; measured in degrees Celsius.

partyCharacteristic.description: Generic class for the characteristics of a party that is involved in this business process.

cityName.description: City name of the visitors address of this party.

cityNamePostBox.description: City name of the mail address of this party.

countryCode.description: country code of the visitors address of this party.

countryCodePostBox.description: Country code of the mail address of this party.

name.description:
Name of this party.
Can be the name of a person, farm, company.

personToContact.description: Name of the person to contact of this party.

postBoxNumber.description: Post box number of the mail address of this party.

postalCodeLocation.description: Postal code of the visitors address of this party.

postalCodePostBox.description: Postal code of the mail address of this party.

streetNameAndNumber.description: Street name and number of the visitors address of this party.

url.description: URL of the website of this party.

vat_Number.description: Value added tax number of this party.

partyIdType.description: Standard data segment for the unique identifier of a party.

scheme.description: Indicator of what type of identifier is used to identify the party. E.g., a GLN, KvK, customer ID, etc.

id.description: The value of the party identifier.

partySchemeCodeType.description:
schemaID = nl.cl709:

nl.ubn = uniek bedrijfsnummer 
nl.kvk = Kamer van Koophandel nummer 
nl.plnt = fabrieksnummer 
nl.brs = bedrijfsregistratienummer 
gln = global location number GS1 
be.pen = productieeenheidnummer België 
nl.ftn = fabrieksnummer + tanknummer 
nl.memnr = lidnummer 
nl.notsp = not specified 
nl.tnk = tanknummer 
nl.ref = allocated by generating party 
nl.vat = btw-nummer 
nl.skal = skal nummer 
cusnr = klantnummer

qualityCharacteristicCodeType.description:
For this, code list 'CL762 Melkonderzoek codering Qlip' is used. Partico dairy companies and Royal Friesland Campina use the same codelist (CL762) for these characteristics. The code list is maintained by Qlip.
In Dutch: betreft in EDI-Zuivel-oud codelijst MELKONDZ (Qlip-nummers melkonderzoek v27nov17.xls).
1 = coligetal 
2 = reinheid 
3 = kiemgetal 
4 = chloroform 
5 = boterzuur 
6 = celgetal 
21 = vetgehalte 
22 = eiwitgehalte 
23 = lactosegehalte
etc, etc.

qualityLine.description: Within the MilkQuality event, the determination of one of the values of a set of quality characteristics (for example for fat, protein, etc.).

milkQualityLineCalculatedIndicatorCode.description: Indicates wether the result is calculated or measured.

milkQualityLinePenaltyPoints.description:
For the Netherlands:  Aantal punten per individueel onderzoek.
Dutch reference: ADED 200463 Aantal punten. Het aantal punten dat bij de kwaliteitsuitslag hoort.

milkQualityLineRemark.description:
Quality classification of this milk delivery.
Dutch reference: Gradatie.

qualityCharacteristicCodeType.description:
Standard code that refers to a specific characteristic (parameter) that indicates the quality of the sampled milk.
Dutch reference: ADED 200460, Nummer melkonderzoek, code MELKONDZ.

qualityCharacteristicDelInd.description: Indicator (true, false) that this record should be deleted (true) by the receiving party.

qualityCharacteristicDescription.description:
Short name of this milk quality characteristic.
Dutch reference: ADED 204529.

qualityCharacteristicValue.description:
The value of the quality characteristic of the milk sample.
Dutch reference: ADED 200462.

quantityLine.description:
Optional, more detailed specification about the delivered quantities of the basic components of  the raw milk: fat, protein, lactose, ureum.
Can be expressed in kilogram or in a percentage. The unit that is to be used (kg, liters or %) is indicated by measurementType.

qualityCharacteristicDescription.description: Short name of a component of raw milk.

quantityCharacteristicCode.description: Code, indicating whether it concerns the quantity of fat, protein, lactose or ureum.

quantityCharacteristicDelInd.description:
True =  this data has been deleted
False = this data has not been deleted

quantityCharacteristicUnit.description: The unit used to express the delivered quantity.

quantityCharacteristicValue.description: The quantity of fat, protein, lactose or ureum.

sample.description: Sample of the raw milk, taken from the milk tank or during the emptying of the milk tank.

id.description: Identifier of a specific sample of milk.

samplingDateTime.description: The time stamp of the sampling of the milk.

unitForPricePerUnitCode.description:
listID = CL020 (measurement units) 
------------------------------------------- 
KGM = kilogram 
LTR = liter 
PERITEM = per stuk
